page.title: 12Farming and Environment
page.content: Most of the farms found in the Old Warden and Ickwell areas are either mixed or arable farms. {Wood Farm Wood Farm owned by the Shuttleworth estate is 360 hectares in size.It has about 400 animals,sheep and a dairy herd. The crops are winter wheat,spring barley,oilseed rape,sugarbeet,and some grass.Silage feeds the dairy herd. {Kingshill farm.} Kingshill farm,farmed by Mr.Capon,is 200 acres in size.It is an arable farm.The crops,wheat,barley,potatoes and brussel sprouts are sold to local markets.Machinery includes 1 combine harvester,2 fork lift trucks and 16 tractors.His only animals are a herd of replacement heifers kept for Shuttleworth college.
